entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Antigonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023
